thread.title: Rosetta
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Rosetta

author: Rosetta
title: Rosetta
text: Mr Tyson stated direct pay frm my bank was the cheapest way to go. He also stated the money would be withrawn on the 28 of the month. I asked if it could bearranged for the first of the month as I only get my retirement on the first of the month. He stated that could be arranged. He withdrew the money on that day, February 23, 2017 without my knowledge and contrary to our agreement. I am now overdrawn on my bank account. I want this money returned too me plus fees incurred. This is causing a hardship for me.
